DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To provide preliminary data feasibility efficacy brief behavioral treatment insomnia ( BBT-I ) insomnia hematopoietic cell transplant ( HCT ) recipient . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To provide preliminary data influence BBT-I cancer-related fatigue ( CRF ) cognitive status BMT recipient . II . To provide preliminary data influence BBT-I quality-of-life ( QOL ) BMT recipient . OUTLINE : Patients complete BBT-I , comprise follow module : 1 ) `` What expect '' term fatigue insomnia occur cancer cancer treatment ; 2 ) A review Spielman Model insomnia ; 3 ) A discussion ( base Spielman Model ) regard insomnia fatigue may co-occur interact context cancer cancer treatment ; 4 ) An introduction concept practice Stimulus Control Therapy ; 5 ) An introduction Sleep Scheduling Specifically modify cancer patient ; 6 ) Sleep Compression ; 7 ) Concomitant Medications Substance Use . After completion study treatment , patient follow 1 month .
